org.netbeans.spi.intent

Annotation Type IntentHandlerRegistration


  • public @interface IntentHandlerRegistration
    Annotation for registering Intent handlers into the application. See org.netbeans.spi.intent for more info and examples.
    See Also:
    org.netbeans.spi.intent

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String[] actions
      List of supported action types.
      String displayName
      Display name of this handler.
      int position
      Position of the handler.
      String uriPattern
      Pattern of supported URIs.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String icon
      Identifier for an icon, e.g.

    • Element Detail

      • position

        public abstract int position
        Position of the handler. The lesser value, the bigger priority.
        Returns:
        The position.

      • actions

        public abstract String[] actions
        List of supported action types. To support all actions, use "*" wildcard.
        Returns:
        List of supported action types. If some of contained values equals "*", all actions are supported.

      • uriPattern

        public abstract String uriPattern
        Pattern of supported URIs. See Pattern. Examples: To handle all URIs, use ".*", to handle http adresses, use "http://.*".
        Returns:
        The URI pattern.

      • displayName

        public abstract String displayName
        Display name of this handler. Bundle keys can be used here.
        Returns:
        The display name.

      • icon

        public abstract String icon
        Identifier for an icon, e.g. path or URI.
        Returns:
        Icon identifier.
        Default:
        ""
